question: What is the first name, last name, and role of the user with userId U123?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.userId="U123"
RETURN user, user.firstName, user.lastName, user.role

question: List the project name, description, and status for projects that started between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)
WHERE project.startDate >= date('2022-01-01') AND project.startDate <= date('2022-12-31')
RETURN project, project.name, project.description, project.status

question: Retrieve all information about the milestone labeled with milestoneId M789 that has exceeded its deadline.
cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.milestoneId = 'M789' AND milestone.deadline < date()
RETURN milestone, milestone.title, milestone.description, milestone.deadline

question: Show the taskId, name, status, estimatedHours, actualHours, and dueDate for tasks that are High priority and are overdue.
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)
WHERE task.priority="High" AND task.dueDate < date() AND task.status="overdue"
RETURN task, task.taskId, task.name, task.status, task.estimatedHours, task.actualHours, task.dueDate

question: Display the commentId, text, and timestamp for comments made after January 1, 2023.
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.timestamp > datetime('2023-01-01T00:00:00')
RETURN comment, comment.commentId, comment.text, comment.timestamp

question: How many projects are currently in Active status?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)
WHERE project.status="Active"
RETURN COUNT(project) AS ActiveProjectCount

question: What are the typical estimated hours for tasks allocated in the year 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE assigned.assignedDate.year = 2022
RETURN avg(task.estimatedHours) AS AverageEstimatedHours

question: Count the number of Teams that have Engineering as part of their team name.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)
WHERE team.name CONTAINS "Engineering"
RETURN COUNT(team)

question: How many tasks have been marked as Completed in all projects?
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)
WHERE task.status = "Completed"
RETURN COUNT(task) AS TotalCompletedTasks

question: Calculate the maximum, minimum, average, and total actual hours spent on tasks within the Development project.
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)<-[relation2:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)
WHERE project.name="Development"
RETURN max(task.actualHours) AS MaxHours, min(task.actualHours) AS MinHours, avg(task.actualHours) AS AvgHours, sum(task.actualHours) AS TotalHours

question: How many Users are assigned the Manager role in all teams?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[membership:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE membership.role = "Manager"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)

question: What are the names and roles of users who are part of a team handling a project with a high-priority task due next month?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[teamWorks:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
MATCH (user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team)
WHERE task.priority = "High" AND task.dueDate >= date({year: date().year, month: date().month + 1, day: 1}) AND task.dueDate < date({year: date().year, month: date().month + 2, day: 1})
RETURN user, memberOf, team, teamWorks, project, includesTask, task, user.firstName, user.lastName, user.role

question: Who are the users assigned to tasks under projects managed by Alice Johnson that have missed their deadlines?
cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
MATCH (assignedUser:User)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task)
WHERE manager.firstName = "Alice" AND manager.lastName = "Johnson" AND task.dueDate < date() AND task.status <> "Completed"
RETURN manager, manages, project, includesTask, task, assignedTo, assignedUser, assignedUser.userId, assignedUser.firstName, assignedUser.lastName

question: Which team members have provided feedback on tasks associated with the milestones that are scheduled to be completed by the end of this year in the projects overseen by Chris Lee?
cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
MATCH (milestone)-[milestoneForTask:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)<-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]-(teamMember:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE manager.firstName = "Chris" AND manager.lastName = "Lee" AND milestone.deadline <= date("2023-12-31")
RETURN teamMember, memberOf, team, commentedOn, task, milestoneForTask, milestone, includesMilestone, project, manages, manager, teamMember.userId, teamMember.firstName, teamMember.lastName

question: Identify the users assigned to the tasks which depend on the completion of the task Design UI in the project New Horizons.
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {name:"New Horizons"})-[relation4:INCLUDES_TASK]->(designTask:Task {name:"Design UI"})
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[relation5:DEPENDS_ON]->(designTask)
MATCH (user:User)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]-(dependentTask)
RETURN relation5, relation4, project, designTask, dependentTask, user, assigned, user.userId, user.firstName, user.lastName

question: Compile a list of project managers along with their team members for projects that have incomplete high-priority tasks.
cypher:
MATCH (projectManager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE task.priority="high" AND task.status <> "finished"
MATCH (team:Team)-[teamWorksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project)
MATCH (teamMember:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team)
RETURN projectManager, manages, project, includesTask, task, team, teamWorksOn, teamMember, memberOf, projectManager.userId, projectManager.firstName, projectManager.lastName, teamMember.userId, teamMember.firstName, teamMember.lastName

question: Provide the email addresses of team leads whose teams are working on projects with pending tasks scheduled for the upcoming quarter.
cypher:
MATCH (teamLead:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF {role: "Team Lead"}]->(team:Team)-[teamWorksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)
MATCH (project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE task.status = "Pending" AND task.dueDate >= date({year: datetime().year, quarter: (datetime().quarter + 1)}) AND task.dueDate < date({year: datetime().year + (datetime().quarter / 4), month: 1, day: 1})
RETURN teamLead, memberOf, team, teamWorksOn, project, includesTask, task, teamLead.email

question: List the set dates of all milestones for tasks that are dependencies of Develop Backend, within projects handled by Julia Turner.
cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[relation5:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[relation6:INCLUDES_TASK]->(mainTask:Task {name: "Develop Backend"})
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[relation7:DEPENDS_ON]->(mainTask)
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(dependentTask)
WHERE manager.firstName = "Julia" AND manager.lastName = "Turner"
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, manager, project, mainTask, dependentTask, milestone, milestoneFor, milestoneFor.setDate

question: For tasks assigned to Michael Smith, detail the joined dates of users in the teams working on related projects.
cypher:
MATCH (taskAssigned:Task)-[assignedRelation:ASSIGNED_TO]->(assignedUser:User)
MATCH (assignedUser)-[partOfRel:PART_OF]->(proj:Project)<-[teamWorksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]-(team:Team)
MATCH (teamMember:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team)
WHERE assignedUser.firstName="Michael" AND assignedUser.lastName="Smith"
RETURN taskAssigned, assignedRelation, assignedUser, partOfRel, proj, teamWorksOn, team, teamMember, memberOf, memberOf.joinedDate

question: Identify all assignment dates for users assigned to priority urgent tasks within the Project Delta.
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {name: "Project Delta"})-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task {priority: "urgent"})
MATCH (assignedUser:User)-[assignment:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task)
RETURN project, includesTask, task, assignedUser, assignment, assignment.assignedDate

question: What is the average actual hours spent on tasks associated with milestones whose deadlines fall in Q3, across all teams?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[relation4:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)-[relation6:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)
WHERE milestone.deadline.month >= 7 AND milestone.deadline.month <= 9
RETURN AVG(task.actualHours)

question: Calculate the total number of tasks assigned to users from Team Alpha within projects started in the last 6 months.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name: "Team Alpha"})-[relation4:MEMBER_OF]-(user:User)-[relation5:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)<-[relation6:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)
WHERE project.startDate >= date() - duration({months: 6})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task)

question: How many high priority tasks are pending in projects where project leads joined their teams more than 2 years ago?
cypher:
MATCH (lead:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project),
      (project)-[includes:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE lead.role = "project lead"
  AND memberOf.joinedDate < date() - duration({years:2})
  AND task.priority = "high"
  AND task.status = "pending"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS PendingHighPriorityTasks

question: What is the total number of comments posted by users on tasks related to projects initiated in the current fiscal year?
cypher:
MATCH (fiscalProject:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)<-[commented:COMMENTED_ON]-(user:User)
WHERE fiscalProject.startDate.year = date().year
RETURN COUNT(commented) AS totalComments

question: Identify the maximum estimated hours for tasks in the project Enterprise Solution that are due before the year-end.
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)-[relation2:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project {name:"Enterprise Solution"})
WHERE task.dueDate < date({year: 2023, month: 12, day: 31})
RETURN MAX(task.estimatedHours) AS maxEstimatedHours

question: What are the email addresses of users who are members of TeamX and have joined after January 1, 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE team.name="TeamX" AND memberOf.joinedDate > date("2022-01-01")
RETURN user, memberOf, team, user.email

question: Can you list the names of all tasks assigned to User U123 that have a priority higher than Medium?
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User {userId: "U123"})
WHERE task.priority > "Medium"
RETURN task, assigned, user, task.name

question: What is the description of the project managed by User JohnDoe where the project status is Delayed?
cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)
WHERE manager.userId="JohnDoe" AND project.status="Delayed"
RETURN manager, manages, project, project.description

question: Can you list all the milestone titles for Project P100 that are due in the fourth quarter of 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {projectId: "P100"})-[includes:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.deadline >= date("2023-10-01") AND milestone.deadline <= date("2023-12-31")
RETURN project, includes, milestone, milestone.title

question: Find the user with the Team Leader role in Team Alpha who is managing a project labeled Completed.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team), (user)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)
WHERE team.name="Alpha" AND memberOf.role="Team Leader" AND project.status="Completed"
RETURN user, memberOf, team, manages, project, user.userId, user.firstName, user.lastName, user.email

question: When did User Maria101 become a member of Team Beta?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[membership:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE user.userId="Maria101" AND team.name="Beta"
RETURN user, membership, team, membership.joinedDate

question: What was the assignment date for the Critical priority task assigned to User User005?
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE task.priority = "Critical" AND user.userId = "User005"
RETURN task, assigned, user, assigned.assignedDate

question: When User UserX joined Team Y last year, was a specific role assigned?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[membership:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE user.userId="UserX" AND team.name="Y" AND membership.joinedDate.year = date().year - 1
RETURN user, membership, team, membership.role

question: Can you find out the start date for which Team DesignCrew started working on Project Website Revamp?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)
WHERE team.name="DesignCrew" AND project.name="Website Revamp"
RETURN team, worksOn, project, worksOn.startDate

question: On what date was the Milestone M12345 set for Task T789?
cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone {milestoneId: "M12345"})-[relation:MILESTONE_FOR]-(task:Task {taskId: "T789"})
RETURN milestone, relation, task, relation.setDate

question: What status was reported during the last update of Task TA123 to its relevant Milestone M456?
cypher:
MATCH (task:Task {taskId: "TA123"})-[updateStatus:REPORTS_STATUS]->(milestone:Milestone {milestoneId: "M456"})
RETURN task, updateStatus, milestone, updateStatus.status

question: What is the mean estimated duration of tasks within Project P001 that have a status of In Progress?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {projectId:"P001"})-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE task.status = "In Progress"
RETURN AVG(task.estimatedHours) AS AverageEstimatedHours

question: Could you determine the sum of tasks allocated to Users in Team DevTeam that are marked with an Urgent priority status?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"DevTeam"})-[relation3:MEMBER_OF]-(user:User)-[assignment:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)
WHERE task.priority="Urgent"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task)

question: What is the maximum actual hours recorded for a task in Project PX202 completed in Q1 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {projectId:"PX202"})-[relation2:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE task.status = "completed" AND task.dueDate.year = 2023 AND task.dueDate.month >= 1 AND task.dueDate.month <= 3
RETURN MAX(task.actualHours) AS MaximumActualHours

question: How many tasks have actual hours that exceed their estimated hours by more than 10% in Project P203?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {projectId: "P203"})-[relation2:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE task.actualHours > 1.1 * task.estimatedHours
RETURN COUNT(task)

question: Can you give the number of milestones scheduled for completion in December 2023 for all projects?
cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.deadline >= date("2023-12-01") AND milestone.deadline <= date("2023-12-31")
RETURN COUNT(milestone) AS MilestonesDueInDecember2023

question: What are the earliest, latest, and mean joining dates for members of Team Gamma?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[membership:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team {name:"Gamma"})
RETURN MIN(membership.joinedDate) AS MinJoinedDate, MAX(membership.joinedDate) AS MaxJoinedDate, AVG(membership.joinedDate) AS AvgJoinedDate

question: What are the surnames and email contacts for users allocated to tasks within the project having projectId P-123?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)<-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)-[includedIn:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project {projectId:"P-123"})
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, includedIn, project, user.lastName, user.email

question: Fetch the names and estimated hours of tasks due on 2023-12-01 associated with projects handled by Team DevOps.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"DevOps"})-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[includes:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task {dueDate: date("2023-12-01")})
RETURN team, worksOn, project, includes, task, task.name, task.estimatedHours

question: For the user John Doe, identify all the milestone titles and deadlines for milestones related to the tasks he is assigned to.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]-(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE user.firstName="John" AND user.lastName="Doe"
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, milestoneFor, milestone, milestone.title, milestone.deadline

question: Can you provide the descriptions and due dates of tasks which are dependent on the task Task101 managed by user Jane Smith?
cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[dependency:DEPENDS_ON]->(mainTask:Task)-[relation4:ASSIGNED_TO]-(manager:User)
WHERE mainTask.taskId = 'Task101' AND manager.firstName = 'Jane' AND manager.lastName = 'Smith'
RETURN relation4, dependentTask, dependency, mainTask, manager, dependentTask.description, dependentTask.dueDate

question: Display the names and statuses of projects that include milestones with a deadline before 2023-07-30 and are being led by a user from the Management team.
cypher:
MATCH (managementTeam:Team {name:"Management"})-[relation4:MEMBER_OF]-(manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.deadline < DATE('2023-07-30')
RETURN relation4, managementTeam, manager, manages, project, includesMilestone, milestone, project.name, project.status

question: When did user U-776 join the team assigned to the project ProjectX?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {userId:"U-776"})-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project {name:"ProjectX"})
RETURN user, memberOf, team, worksOn, project, memberOf.joinedDate

question: What are the commencement dates for teams involved in projects that include TaskX, where the task in question is marked as Critical?
cypher:
MATCH (criticalTask:Task {status:"Critical", name:"TaskX"})<-[included:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)<-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]-(team:Team)
RETURN criticalTask, included, project, worksOn, team, worksOn.startDate

question: What are the assigned dates of users to the tasks that are milestones for the Yearly Review project that concluded on 2023-05-15?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {name: "Yearly Review", endDate: date("2023-05-15")})-[relation4:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]-(milestone:Milestone)-[relation5:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(user:User)
RETURN relation5, relation4, project, milestone, task, user, assignedTo, assignedTo.assignedDate

question: How many users were assigned to tasks by Manager M in the project Expansion2023 and what was the latest assigned date among them?
cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[relation4:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE manager.firstName="Manager" AND manager.lastName="M" AND project.name="Expansion2023"
RETURN relation5, relation4, manager, project, task, assigned, user, COUNT(user) as count, MAX(assigned.assignedDate) as latestAssignedDate

question: What is the earliest date that a task was reported as Completed under milestone Milestone 5 of project P-500?
cypher:
MATCH (proj:Project {projectId:"P-500"})-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone {title:"Milestone 5"})
MATCH (milestone)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)
MATCH (task)-[reportStatus:REPORTS_STATUS {status:"Completed"}]->(milestone)
RETURN proj, includesMilestone, milestone, milestoneFor, task, reportStatus, reportStatus.updateTime AS updateTime
ORDER BY reportStatus.updateTime ASC
LIMIT 1

question: Identify the assignment details and the dates of joining for employees engaged in High Risk tasks within a project overseen by Jane Austin.
cypher:
MATCH (leader:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includes:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]->(employee:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE leader.firstName="Jane" AND leader.lastName="Austin" AND task.priority="High Risk"
RETURN leader, manages, project, includes, task, assignedTo, employee, memberOf, team, assignedTo.assignedDate, memberOf.joinedDate

question: How many tasks, with priority High, are there on projects managed by users who belong to the Executive team?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name: "Executive"})<-[relation4:MEMBER_OF]-(user:User)-[relation5:MANAGES]->(project:Project)
MATCH (project)-[relation6:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task {priority: "High"})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task)

question: What is the average estimated hours of tasks that depend on tasks assigned to users who joined the team before 2020-01-01?
cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[relation4:DEPENDS_ON]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE memberOf.joinedDate < date('2020-01-01')
RETURN AVG(dependentTask.estimatedHours)

question: Count the number of unique projects worked on by the members of the team QuickSolution where they contributed to tasks of Low priority.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name: "QuickSolution"})-[relation4:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)<-[relation5:PART_OF]-(member:User)-[relation6:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task {priority: "Low"})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT project)

question: What is the maximum number of tasks any user has been assigned in projects having at least ten milestones?
cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)-[relation4:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WITH project, COUNT(milestone) AS milestonesCount
WHERE milestonesCount >= 10
MATCH (project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_TASK]-(task:Task)-[relation6:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
RETURN user.userId, COUNT(task) AS tasksCount
ORDER BY tasksCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Identify the lowest and highest actual hours users dedicated to tasks associated with milestones finished in the previous quarter.
cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE milestone.deadline >= date.truncate('quarter', date()) - duration({months: 3}) AND milestone.deadline < date.truncate('quarter', date())
RETURN MIN(task.actualHours) AS MinActualHours, MAX(task.actualHours) AS MaxActualHours

question: Calculate the sum of due dates for tasks associated with the projects that each team in 2023 Business Expansion is working on.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE project.name="2023 Business Expansion"
RETURN team.name AS TeamName, SUM(task.dueDate) AS SumDueDates
